name: ChemForFun
0:
”Alexa open chemistry facts”
”Alexa ask chemistry facts for a fact”
”Alexa tell chemistry facts to tell me trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chemistry facts
des:
Ask for Chemistry Facts, and learn about what really matters, like periodic trends.

Chemistry Facts provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Chemistry Facts" or "Alexa, open Chemistry Facts" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
